rules_text:
Whenever another legendary creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on The Lost and Seeking.
Surpass {4}{R}{W} [i]({4}{R}{W}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
special_text2:
As this permanent transforms into Ameret, counters on Ameret become loyalty counters instead.
[+1]: Until end of turn, you may have Ameret become a X/X Angel creature with flying, indestructible, and haste, where X is the number of counters on them.
[-2]: Create three 1/1 white and red Cleric creature tokens with lifelink and haste.
